entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 10:35 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
